About Me

I have been working and developing for about 5 years now. My professional focus is mainly on Web Design, Web Development, App Development, but I also enjoy experimenting in all the areas that interest me, such as Game Development, IoT (Internet of Things), AI and so on. I guess I'm just a tech enthusiast :) I also have experience with Digital Marketing, having worked with SEM (Search Engine Marketing) and SEO (Search Engine Optimization). All these practices come together in any of my projects. You can check my Github for more technical information on my projects or if you prefer you can contact me directly - I'm a quick replier ;) As a developer, it doesn't matter if you would like to build a website, an app, or a web application from scratch, if you would like me to have a look and help your existing project, or even which programming languages you use. I really enjoy diving into new projects and challenges and we can definitely have a chat on how we can help each other and add more value to your business. Count me in!

Digital Salon

Full Stack Developer

Working as a Full Stack Developer for Digital Salon I covered all aspects of the Web Development for the company: the front-end, back-end and system administration. We have used a wide range of resources, depending on the request and necessity. I have mainly worked with the Wordpress Content Management System and WooCommerce platform, working with Premium Themes and plugins or Designing it from scratch. In this case PHP has been mainly the back-end programming language, and the Web Server were configured and maintained at Digital Ocean.

Freelance Work

Web and Mobile App Development

I have also worked on a few stand alone projects and have created different templates for various audiences: Photographers, Restaurants, Hair and Beuty Salons, Marketing Agencies, and so on. On the Mobile App side I have created a few different apps for different purposes that include most of the main features asked in apps these days, such as a user registration, chat capabilities, push notifications, e-commerce shops, cart and checkouts, and so on. For these I have used the frameworks Angular, Ionic, and Laravel. I really enjoy experimenting with different technologies and see what they have to offer.

Game Development

Coding and Design

I have been working on personal Game Development projects for fun with the Unity Engine. I code (C#) and pick or create the assets myself. I really like the technical part of making a game as it is a great way to code in best practices and see everything coming together. You can check some of this work on my Github as well.
